creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: color pencil drawing on paperbard of zodiac wheel with pie-shaped sections each containing a symbol of the zodiac: Cancer, Scorpio, Taurus, Aries, Leo, etc.; many colorful faces in variety of syles outside of wheel; at center of wheel is a square containing faces; floating mount in silver color metal frame with wire attached
inscription: old label with frame: THE ZODIAC / SANDFORD / TWO E. OAK ST. / 642-0056 / $10000.00; Art Institute of Chicago label with frame: Seventy-fourth Exhibition by Artists / of Chicago and Vicinity / MARCH [illeg] MAY 6, 1973 / SANDFORD 703 / TWO E. OAK ST. / CHGO. ILL. / ZODIAC / PENCIL / 5700.00
markings: Hindman hang tag attached to frame: AUCTION / HINDMAN / 152 / Sale 1260; [verso] HINDMAN / RECEIPT# / 307651 / 37; label verso C of frame: THE COLLECTION OF PHILIP J. AND SUZANNE SCHILLER / AMERICAN SOCIAL COMMENTARY ART - 1930-1970...
title: The Zodiac
